decimal-length.description: The number of decimal places of the amount

label.description: Amount to the left of the copy

suffix-label.description: Amount to the right of the copy

text-align.description: The amount copy is aligned, and the optional value is left
text-align.description_zh: 金额文案对齐方向，可选值为 left

tip.description: Prompt copy above the order bar
tip.description_zh: 在订单栏上方的提示文案

tip-icon.description: The icon name or image link on the left side of the prompt copy is equivalent to the [name attribute](#/en-CN/icon#props) of the Icon component.
tip-icon.description_zh: 提示文案左侧的图标名称或图片链接，等同于 Icon 组件的 [name 属性](https://vant-docs.netlify.app/#/zh-CN/icon#props)

loading.description: Whether or not to display the Loading button
loading.description_zh: 是否显示将按钮显示为加载中状态

placeholder.description: Whether to generate a placeholder element of equal height at the label position
placeholder.description_zh: 是否在标签位置生成一个等高的占位元素

events.name: submit
events.description: button to click the event callback

slots.name: default
slots.description: Customize the content on the left side of the order bar
slots.description_zh: 自定义订单栏左侧内容

slots.name: top
slots.description: Customize the content above the order column
slots.description_zh: 自定义订单栏上方内容

slots.name: tip
slots.description: Prompt extra content in your copy
slots.description_zh: 提示文案中的额外内容
